properties.title: Pumptrack Lerchenfeld
properties.abstract: The asphalt pump track with rollers and berms is located in the middle of the Lerchenfeld neighbourhood of Thun. There is a separate section for kids and beginners. It covers a total of 900 m2 and is part of the playground of the same name.
properties.description:
The weather-resistant pump track is a playground for everyone, big or small, because any type of non-motorised wheels can be used. Balance can be trained on the rollers and berms, even jumps are possible.

Adjacent to it is a climbing frame, a sandbox with a fountain, a ping pong table, additional green areas, and a public toilet. All of this is part of the generous Lerchenfeld playground.

Surface area: 900 m2
Length: 150 m
